attributes.review: this app took A WHOLE MONTH to download. DISAPPOINTED. it also started sending me notifications calling me UGLY AND FAT???? like i downloaded to help trump but apparently he doesn’t appreciate me. taking my vote somewhere else.
attributes.title: longest wait ever

attributes.review: This is the WORST app in the App Store! Nothing works! It’s so horrible that I can’t even put it into words! Glitches, won’t download, horrible speed. I wish I could give 0 stars.
attributes.title: Glitches

attributes.review: Very disappointed.. this app took 12 HOURS to download. It also provided a lot of fake news.
attributes.title: Make America have apps that don’t take 12 hours to download again❤️🇺🇸

attributes.review: it took literally three presidential terms to download this app and once it was done this annoying orange guy showed up on my screen i scared me and my fish so much it caused my fish lucky to drown 😭 that’s not even the worst part after killing my fish this app hacked my phone and sent me some orange guys noodes 🤮 i have never wanted to be less alive in my life and to too things off this app gave me a virus 🦠
attributes.title: worst app ever 🤢

attributes.review: Just no, I lasted two seconds in this app before I got annoyed by his face at the beginning screen. Save yourself the time and dont get this garbage. Ps. TikTok shall rise and I’m not letting trump take it down so good luck sucka cuz you gon need it with this army💪🏼
attributes.title: Nah

attributes.review: I was minding my own business when the big smelly Cheeto man broke into my house and threw my cat against the wall! I don’t know what the poor cat did to deserve this, all I did was download the app! Never again.
attributes.title: ICKY!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and then I could see charli damelio in the distance doing renegade and I could also here “be happy“ by dixie damelio😡I could see lil huddy’s skin turning black and I could see Josh Richards singing still softish on his balcony. One star.
attributes.title: ONE STAR😡😡😡

attributes.review: It took a while WEEK to download. And then when it downloaded my phone crashed for 3 until I went to the store to fix it.
My phone exploded from downloading the app. Then my cat died, pretty sure it was cause of the app too. For personal reasons I will not be suing but I really should. Download at your own risk 👁👄👁
attributes.title: This app is worse than 2020

attributes.review: As a true American I just HAD to try to download but it Took forever to download and caused freezing. Overall hard to navigate. Shouldn’t be on the App Store.
attributes.title: Can’t stand this app
